bibl.author: W. A. Field
bibl.title: W. A. Field to D. W. Middleton, 8 May 1869
bibl.idno: Entry 10, Record Group 60, Letter Book G

revisionDesc.change: removed spaces surrounding em-dashes and inserted space between initials
checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: Will you please send to this office a certified copy of the opinion of the Court in the Texas case, so‑called, in which it was decided that Texas was so far a State of the United States as to be able to maintain a suit in the Courts of the United States.
body.note: Copy of Sup. Court opinion requested.
